name: Marion Cotillard
description: Acclaimed French actress known for her versatile performances and international recognition.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Marion Cotillard was born in 1975 in Paris, France. She began her acting career in the 1990s, appearing in French cinema and television. Over the years, she has gained a reputation for her ability to embody complex and diverse characters.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Marion Cotillard has collaborated frequently with director Christopher Nolan, starring in films like *Inception* and *The Dark Knight Rises*. She has also worked with esteemed directors such as the Dardenne brothers and Jacques Audiard.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Marion Cotillard is considered one of the finest actresses of her generation, winning numerous awards, including an Academy Award, a Golden Globe, and a BAFTA. Her work is celebrated for its emotional depth and range, and she continues to be a significant influence in both European and Hollywood cinema.
